Initial release

"Resolve javascript website keep popping up ("Home", after login)
"
 "Remove unused permissions"

*Francis joined*
 Implement "About" tab

 Divide "Home" into "Login" and "School Website" tabs


Improve dashboard performance

 Resolve fragments not inflating for larger screens

 Resolve elements not always blocked

 Resolve blank documents to be able to be opened

 Resolve calendar wrong time problem (new calendar)

 Support orientation

 Support offline Pdf Viewer (only for School Calendar, 3C Half Day Schedule and The Notice of the month)
Add translation for Chinese
Improve "About" UI
Add "Settings" for changing between languages and themes

 Support for dark theme
Improve pdf viewer by adding a scroll bar and page separator
"*Andrew joined*
